amendment.description: Amendment encourages States to include the number of students attaining career and technical education proficiencies and who are enrolled in public secondary schools in its annual state report card. Such information is already required to be collected by the Perkins Act and streamlines access to information for the public.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Benishek amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Benishek.
